00030 #ifndef __defined_libdai_smallset_h
00031 #define __defined_libdai_smallset_h
00032 
00033 
00034 #include <vector>
00035 #include <algorithm>
00036 
00037 
00038 namespace dai {
00039 
00040 
00042 
00046 template <typename T>
00047 class smallSet {
00048     private:
00050         std::vector<T> _elements;
00051 
00052     public:
00054         smallSet() : _elements() {}
00055 
00057         smallSet( const T &n ) : _elements() { 
00058             _elements.push_back( n );
00059         }
00060 
00062         smallSet( const T &n1, const T &n2 ) { 
00063             if( n1 < n2 ) {
00064                 _elements.push_back( n1 );
00065                 _elements.push_back( n2 );
00066             } else if( n2 < n1 ) {
00067                 _elements.push_back( n2 );
00068                 _elements.push_back( n1 );
00069             } else
00070                 _elements.push_back( n1 );
00071         }
00072 
00074 
00079         template <typename Iterator>
00080         smallSet( Iterator begin, Iterator end, size_t sizeHint=0 ) {
00081             _elements.reserve( sizeHint );
00082             _elements.insert( _elements.begin(), begin, end );
00083             std::sort( _elements.begin(), _elements.end() );
00084             typename std::vector<T>::iterator new_end = std::unique( _elements.begin(), _elements.end() );
00085             _elements.erase( new_end, _elements.end() );
00086         }
00087 
00089         smallSet( const smallSet &x ) : _elements( x._elements ) {}
00090 
00092         smallSet & operator=( const smallSet &x ) {
00093             if( this != &x ) {
00094                 _elements = x._elements;
00095             }
00096             return *this;
00097         }
00098         
00100         smallSet operator/ ( const smallSet& ns ) const {
00101             smallSet res;
00102             std::set_difference( _elements.begin(), _elements.end(), ns._elements.begin(), ns._elements.end(), inserter( res._elements, res._elements.begin() ) );
00103             return res;
00104         }
00105 
00107         smallSet operator| ( const smallSet& ns ) const {
00108             smallSet res;
00109             std::set_union( _elements.begin(), _elements.end(), ns._elements.begin(), ns._elements.end(), inserter( res._elements, res._elements.begin() ) );
00110             return res;
00111         }
00112 
00114         smallSet operator& ( const smallSet& ns ) const {
00115             smallSet res;
00116             std::set_intersection( _elements.begin(), _elements.end(), ns._elements.begin(), ns._elements.end(), inserter( res._elements, res._elements.begin() ) );
00117             return res;
00118         }
00119         
00121         smallSet& operator/= ( const smallSet& ns ) {
00122             return (*this = (*this / ns));
00123         }
00124 
00126         smallSet& operator/= ( const T& n ) { 
00127             typename std::vector<T>::iterator pos = lower_bound( _elements.begin(), _elements.end(), n );
00128             if( pos != _elements.end() )
00129                 if( *pos == n ) // found element, delete it
00130                     _elements.erase( pos ); 
00131             return *this; 
00132         }
00133 
00135         smallSet& operator|= ( const smallSet& ns ) {
00136             return( *this = (*this | ns) );
00137         }
00138 
00140         smallSet& operator|= ( const T& n ) {
00141             typename std::vector<T>::iterator pos = lower_bound( _elements.begin(), _elements.end(), n );
00142             if( pos == _elements.end() || *pos != n ) // insert it
00143                 _elements.insert( pos, n );
00144             return *this;
00145         }
00146 
00148         smallSet& operator&= ( const smallSet& ns ) { 
00149             return (*this = (*this & ns));
00150         }
00151 
00153         bool operator<< ( const smallSet& ns ) const { 
00154             return std::includes( ns._elements.begin(), ns._elements.end(), _elements.begin(), _elements.end() );
00155         }
00156 
00158         bool operator>> ( const smallSet& ns ) const { 
00159             return std::includes( _elements.begin(), _elements.end(), ns._elements.begin(), ns._elements.end() );
00160         }
00161 
00163         bool intersects( const smallSet& ns ) const { 
00164             return( (*this & ns).size() > 0 ); 
00165         }
00166 
00168         bool contains( const T& n ) const { 
00169             return std::binary_search( _elements.begin(), _elements.end(), n );
00170         }
00171 
00173         typedef typename std::vector<T>::const_iterator const_iterator;
00175         typedef typename std::vector<T>::iterator iterator;
00177         typedef typename std::vector<T>::const_reverse_iterator const_reverse_iterator;
00179         typedef typename std::vector<T>::reverse_iterator reverse_iterator;
00180         
00182         iterator begin() { return _elements.begin(); }
00184         const_iterator begin() const { return _elements.begin(); }
00185 
00187         iterator end() { return _elements.end(); }
00189         const_iterator end() const { return _elements.end(); }
00190 
00192         reverse_iterator rbegin() { return _elements.rbegin(); }
00194         const_reverse_iterator rbegin() const { return _elements.rbegin(); }
00195 
00197         reverse_iterator rend() { return _elements.rend(); }
00199         const_reverse_iterator rend() const { return _elements.rend(); }
00200 
00202         typename std::vector<T>::size_type size() const { return _elements.size(); }
00203 
00205         bool empty() const { return _elements.size() == 0; }
00206 
00208         friend bool operator==( const smallSet &a, const smallSet &b ) {
00209             return (a._elements == b._elements);
00210         }
00211 
00213         friend bool operator!=( const smallSet &a, const smallSet &b ) {
00214             return !(a._elements == b._elements);
00215         }
00216 
00218         friend bool operator<( const smallSet &a, const smallSet &b ) {
00219             return a._elements < b._elements;
00220         }
00221 };
00222 
00223 
00224 } // end of namespace dai
